mil7.4.8:5.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘sūriyassa satta aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni satta aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.4.8:5.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbakilesā anavasesaṃ parisosetabbā.
mil7.4.8:5.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sūriyassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.8:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, sūriyo tamandhakāraṃ vidhamati;
mil7.4.8:6.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbaṃ rāgatamaṃ dosatamaṃ mohatamaṃ mānatamaṃ diṭṭhitamaṃ kilesatamaṃ sabbaṃ duccaritatamaṃ vidhamayitabbaṃ.
mil7.4.8:6.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sūriyassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.8:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, sūriyo abhikkhaṇaṃ carati;
mil7.4.8:7.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena abhikkhaṇaṃ yoniso manasikāro kātabbo.
mil7.4.8:7.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sūriyassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.8:8.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ārammaṇamālinā bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.4.8:8.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sūriyassa catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.8:9.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, sūriyo mahājanakāyaṃ santāpento carati;
mil7.4.8:9.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ācārasīlaguṇavattappaṭipattiyā jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattiindriyabalabojjhaṅgasatipaṭṭhānasammappadhānaiddhipādehi sadevako loko santāpayitabbo.
mil7.4.8:9.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sūriyassa pañcamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.8:10.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, sūriyo rāhubhayā bhīto carati;
mil7.4.8:10.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena duccaritaduggativisamakantāravipākavinipātakilesajālajaṭite diṭṭhisaṅghāṭapaṭimukke kupathapakkhande kummaggapaṭipanne satte disvā mahatā saṃvegabhayena mānasaṃ saṃvejetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.8:10.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sūriyassa chaṭṭhaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.8:11.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, sūriyo kalyāṇapāpake dasseti;
mil7.4.8:11.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena indriyabalabojjhaṅgasatipaṭṭhānasammappadhānaiddhipādalokiyalokuttaradhammā dassetabbā.
mil7.4.8:11.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sūriyassa sattamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
